RobotEngine - Class in tp.pr5
This class represents the robot engine.
RobotEngine(City, Place, Direction) - Constructor for class tp.pr5.RobotEngine
Creates the robot engine in an initial place, facing an initial direction and with a city map.
RobotEngineObserver - Interface in tp.pr5
Interface of the observers that want to be notified about the events ocurred in the robot engine.
